Issue.creator: avkrishnan
Issue.summary: As someone viewing log messages, every log message should have a time stamp at the beginning
Issue.description: Given I'm any type of User looking at the logs I should see: 1. A timestamp prefixed to every log message following ISO 86012. A time zone -3. Log in UTC-4. Replace the "T" with a space in the ISO standard5. Use a comma to separate the seconds and millisecondsExample: 2017-03-08 18:10:22,452+00:00 <log message here>*So that I can debug easier, know what time each log message was sent and so that Evernym has clearer log messages.*
